name: Animals Tiles Hop EDM Rush
description:
Listen to the beat and make as many hops as you can in this mind-blowing music game, jump off the magic music piano tiles...!!!!

Animals Tiles Hop is the number one music game of the decade. Music lovers can engage themselves in these days by hopping their animals on challenging surfaces. Not only humans, animals can also music

The Game is totally Free! Play this cute musical animal hopping now!

How to Play:
1. Touch, Hold and Drag to make the animal jump on the tiles.
2. Don't Miss the Tiles!
3. Make sure to follow the rhythm for each song.
4. Challenge your friends!

Game features:
Endless hours of fun
Very Challenging
100s of songs
Tons of animals
Beautiful themed graphics
Hypercasual controls
